title: Thyme

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may spy on someone's house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will know all the roles of the players that visit your target.
- Your visit is Astral and ignores Jail.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to spy on (player)'s house."
"You saw a (role) visit your target!"
"Your target was jailed, but you watched their house anyway."

desc:
Post 153
*You are a shapeshifting child who enjoys spying on others.*
